settings.title:
Try Turbo.
It'll be music to your ears.
settings.subtitle: Give your shop a boost with this premium theme

settings.title: This page is using the Product Details template
settings.content: When you apply the product.details template to one or more of you products, you will have some additional settings available when you navigate to this product in the theme editor. You can then add content below your main product area, such as a Rich text and image section like this one. Other optional sections include an Image gallery (3 photos per row), a full-width Image with text overlay, or an Image with text which has text on one side and an image on the other. You can even control the spacing between all these additional content blocks by adding a "divider" section!

settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: This is an Image with text content block that you can add to your product page by using the product.details template included in the Turbo theme. Use some high impact images to promote cross-sales, or try a team photo and link to your About page; you can even insert an animated gif file!

settings.title: Pump up the volume
settings.subtitle:
Turbo is perfect for high volume Shopify Plus shops!
But it's also an excellent choice for any size shop that's looking for an edge.

settings.title: This is our Story
settings.subtitle: Create a custom page with this flexible template!

settings.title: Page details
settings.content: This page is using the "page.details" template, which contains many content options similar to those available on the home page. For example, you can add an image gallery, contact form, Google map, quote, image with text overlay and even insert another page! For full instructions on how to set up and use this template, please see our Page Details support article.

settings.quote_text: 40% of online shoppers abandon a site that takes more than 3 seconds to load

settings.title: Share your story
settings.text: A great "About" or "Our Story" page helps builds trust between you and your customers. The more content you provide about you and your business, the more confident people will be when purchasing from your store. An interesting and authentic About page can even increase sales, so spend time crafting a compelling one!

settings.title: An amazing group of people are the heart and soul of this phenomenal brand!
When will my package arrive?
settings.subtitle: Our standard shipping time is between 3-5 days from our warehouse based in Ostrava, Czech Republic.

settings.title: Do you provide warranty?
settings.subtitle:
Yes! We provide 2* year warranty for our mirrors. Please contact us at info@thespeculum.com if needed!

The warranty does not cover any physical damage done to any part of the mirror.

*4 years if additionally purchased

settings.title: Do you offer bulk discount?
settings.subtitle: Yes! Please let us know at info@thespeculum.com and we shall craft a custom offer just for you!

settings.title: What if I want to return a product?
settings.subtitle: We offer a 14 day return guarantee for all our products. Contact us at info@thespeculum.com to receive instructions.

settings.title: Is there anywhere I may view your products in person?
settings.subtitle:
Unfortunately, in order to keep being cost efficent and giving you the best prices, we have no intentions of opening up a storefront.

Nevertheless, please contact us if you need more photos of the products installed, we'll be glad to share!

settings.title: What about instalation?
settings.subtitle: Instalation of our products is very straight foward with all the needed information included in the packaging.

settings.title: Do you deliver to ____
settings.subtitle: We deliver our goods all over Europe with plans of an expansion in the future!

settings.title: Is my payment information secure?
settings.subtitle: The Speculum utilizes the industry standard in encrypting any information you type in our website. From checkout to order confirmation, your information is secure. The payment gateway is secured by world-renowed providers: Stripe or Paypal

settings.title: What payment options do you accept?
settings.subtitle: We accept all major credit card cards including Visa, MasterCard, American Express + Apple pay & Paypal

settings.title: What is your cancellation policy?
settings.subtitle: Cancellation is possible up to 48 hours (workdays) of placing the order. After 48 hours certain fees apply, please visit this page for more information.

settings.title: What if my order arrives damaged?
settings.subtitle: If by some chance, your item was damaged during transit, please contact us at info@thespeculum.com within  the next 30 hours upon arrival. The Speculum cannot accept responsibility for any damages or missing parts not reported within this timeframe.

settings.title: Can I track my order?
settings.subtitle: Yes! Simply insert the code we sent you to this page.

settings.title: Do you offer different sizes/designs of the mirrors?
settings.subtitle: We plan on expanding our product line very soon, please sign up to our newsletter to stay updated!

settings.newsletter_text: Stay up to date on our releases and promotions

settings.title: Added the touch I was looking for
settings.testimonial: The Speculum mirrors get lot of attention from the guests at my hotel and I always happily recommend them.
settings.name: John Sterling

settings.title: Stunning
settings.testimonial: Absolutely love the mirror, looks stunning at night! Attracts many curious looks as not many people have seen such a mirror before. Already bought one more as a gift for my parents.
settings.name: Silvia Sánchez

settings.title: A great fit
settings.testimonial: A great fit for my newly renovated bathroom, adds a futuristic feel to it. While the looks are great, the smart features are what sold me. Came in nicely packaged with all the needed instructions inside. Shipped to Germany without any problems.
settings.name: Paul Engel

settings.title: Time-saving
settings.testimonial: Since I got The Speculum mirror my time spent in the bathroom has noticeably lowered. I don't loose the track of time so easily and thanks to the demister I don't have to waste any time wiping steam off the mirror. Never though a mirror could save my time.
settings.name: Elisabeth Boucher

settings.title: Helpful customer support
settings.testimonial: I was looking to add something unique to my apartment and then facebook showed me The Speculum. I have never seen a smart mirror before and was intrigued. Before buying I contacted the support team about shipping details. They were very helpful and the whole process went smoothly. Very satisfied with my purchase.
settings.name: Rick Walker

settings.title: Avant-garde
settings.testimonial: I use The Speculum mirrors in my modern bathroom designs as they disrupt the status quo and create a distinctive ambience. My clients are always happy with them.
settings.name: Bill Haas

settings.title: Invisible display
settings.button_label: ← Click  to Turn the display on

settings.title: Demister
settings.text: Do not waste any more time trying to wipe your mirror after a shower, one touch and the mirror is mist free.

settings.title: Led lights
settings.text:
The Speculum Smart mirror is backlit with high quality  LED lights with built-in control of the color temperature. (cold/warm)

Our lights are dust and water resistant making them suitable for any environment.
settings.button_label: ← click to Switch the lights on

settings.title: Top quality glass
settings.text:
All our mirrors are silver ion plated and tempered to provide the highest possible shock and explosion resistance and the clearest possible reflection. Our mirror will not shatter into shards when damaged, similar to a car windshield.

The entire mirror is lead-free and made without the use of any harmful substances making it nature-friendly.

settings.custom_html:
Technical specifications

Dimensions 80x60 cm
Thickness including the instalation parts 4,4 cm
Glass panel thickness 5 mm
Weight 9,8 kg
Power consumption 3 W LED/50W Demister/2W Display
Voltage 110-240V
Protection rating IP54
Certificates CE, RoHS, FCC
Warranty 2 years/4 years if purchased
